Text:
Hi Big_Dude
can you upload ps1 "fighting force 2" and "galerians"? Thanx
Game wasn't able to rebuild to dvd some games you can't.

In the Release notes it sez that it cannot be converted to DVD. therefore you cannot patch with ESR cos it has to be on a DVD. those with Free McBoot could try putting it on a hard drive and using OPL to load it.

This must be the smallest ps2 game ever. 60meg! shrinks to 50meg when converted to iso. i put the image in a virtual drive (alcohol 120%). then ripped it as an iso with ImgBurn. renamed iso to SLES_518.59.Billiards.iso  
Dragged it onto a USB drive in a folder called CD. booted PS2 with Free McBoot then loaded iso with OPL from USB drive.
